Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: I don't mind having your company for a moment.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: How would you prove that your belief is true beyond any doubt?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: My trust and belief are the proof themselves, ma'am.
Speaker.line3: If I believe it, then it must be the truest for myself.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: I'm sure we'll have a pleasant time together.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I think it's more of a personal preference, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Disappoint
Speaker.line2: I believe there's more on your mind, isn't there?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: At least more than what you just answered.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Feel free to open up. Do not hesitate to share with me.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: It's been a while since I've had afternoon tea like this.
